exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V x : K Unable to unify "R" with "x = zero \\/ (exists y : K, mult y x = one)".
The reference PS_opp was not found in the current environment.
The reference opp_mult_distr_r_reverse was not found in the current environment.

original: apply PSeries_ext. intro n. unfold PSeries. unfold PS_opp. rewrite opp_mult_distr_r_reverse. reflexivity.
